Verses: 1 iraNdaandharam karththarudaiya vaarththai yOnaavukku uNdaagi, avar:
2 nee ezhundhu magaa nagaramaagiya ninivEkkup pOi, naan unakkuk kaRpikkum vaarththaiyai adhaRku virOdhamaaip prasangi endraar.
3 yOnaa ezhundhu, karththarudaiya vaarththaiyinpadiyE ninivEkkup pOnaan; ninivE moondrunaaL prayaaNa viSthaaramaana magaa periya nagaramaayirundhadhu.
4 yOnaa nagaraththil pravEsiththu, orunaaL prayaaNampaNNi: innum naaRpadhunaaL uNdu; appozhudhu ninivE kavizhkkappattuppOm endru kooRinaan.
5 appozhudhu ninivEyiluLLa janangaL dhEvanai visuvaasiththu, ubavaasancheyyumpadik kooRinaargaL; periyOrmudhal siRiyOrmattum rattuduththikkoNdaargaL.
6 indha seydhi ninivEyin raajaavukku ettinapOdhu, avan than singaasanaththaivittu ezhundhu, thaan uduththiyirundha uduppaik kazhatrippOttu, rattai uduththikkoNdu saambalilE utkaarndhaan.

7 mElum raajaa, thaanum than pradhaanigaLum nirNayampaNNina kattaLaiyaaga, ninivEyil engumï¿½ manusharum mirugangaLum, maadugaLum aadugaLum ondrum rusipaaraadhirukkavum, mEyaamalum thaNNeer kudiyaamalum irukkavum,

8 manusharum mirugangaLum rattinaal moodikkoNdu, dhEvanai nOkki uraththa saththamaaik kooppidavum, avaravar thamtham pollaadha vazhiyaiyum thamtham kaigaLiluLLa kodumaiyaiyum vittuth thirumbavunkadavargaL.
9 yaarukkuththeriyum; naam azhindhupOgaadhapadikku oruvELai dhEvan manaSthaabappattu, thammudaiya ukkira kObaththaivittuth thirumbinaalum thirumbuvaar endru kooRachchonnaan.

10 avargaL thangaL pollaadha vazhiyaivittuth thirumbinaargaLendru dhEvan avargaLudaiya kiriyaigaLaip paarththu, thaam avargaLukku seyvEn endru solliyirundha theengaikkuRiththu manaSthaabappattu, adhai seyyaadhirundhaar.
